titleStmt.title: No-body, and some-body· With the true chronicle historie of Elydure, who was fortunately three seuerall times crowned King of England. The true coppy thereof, as it hath beene acted by the Queens Maiesties Seruants.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by James Roberts] for Iohn Trundle and are to be sold at his shop in Barbican, at the signe of No-body,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
The first leaf is blank. The last leaf verso has a woodcut with caption: Some-body.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Barbican, at the signe of No-body
